agreement.header.subtitle: BIC Intelligence Smart Q&A Assistant
agreement.header.title: BIC-QA User Agreement
agreement.meta.title: User Agreement - BIC-QA
agreement.section1.content:
Welcome to the BIC-QA Intelligent Q&A Assistant (the "Service"). This User Agreement (the "Agreement") is concluded between you and BIC Intelligence ("we", "us").

Please read the entire Agreement carefully. If you disagree with any clause, you may choose not to use the Service. Your continued use of the Service constitutes your acceptance of all provisions of this Agreement.
agreement.section1.title: 1. Overview
agreement.section10.content:
This Agreement takes effect when you start using the Service and remains effective until the Service is terminated.

Last Updated: August 1, 2025
agreement.section10.title: 10. Effective Date
agreement.section2.content:
BIC-QA is an intelligent Q&A assistant powered by artificial intelligence, offering the following core features:

  • Smart Q&A: Generate answers using large language models.
  • Knowledge-base search: Retrieve answers from multiple knowledge bases.
  • Page summarization: Produce summaries for web content automatically.
  • Text translation: Support multilingual translation.
  • History management: Save and review your Q&A history.
agreement.section2.title: 2. Service Scope
agreement.section3.content:
3.1 User Rights

  • Access and use all available features of the Service.
  • Receive timely and accurate technical support.
  • Provide feedback and suggestions about the Service.
  • Export personal data when the Service is terminated.

3.2 User Obligations

  • Comply with applicable laws and regulations of the People‚Äôs Republic of China.
  • Refrain from using the Service for unlawful or prohibited activities.
  • Do not attack or damage the Service infrastructure.
  • Safeguard your account credentials.
  • Avoid distributing illegal, harmful, threatening, abusive, harassing, defamatory, vulgar, obscene, or otherwise inappropriate content.
agreement.section3.title: 3. User Rights and Obligations
agreement.section4.content:
The Service and its related technologies, software, algorithms, and interface designs are protected by intellectual property laws. Without our prior written consent, you may not:

  • Copy, modify, or distribute the Service‚Äôs source code.
  • Reverse engineer, decompile, or disassemble the Service.
  • Remove or alter copyright notices.
  • Use the Service for commercial purposes unless authorized.
agreement.section4.title: 4. Intellectual Property
agreement.section5.content:
We value your privacy. For details, please refer to the Privacy Policy. We undertake to:

  • Collect, use, and protect personal information in accordance with the law.
  • Never sell, rent, or trade your personal information to third parties.
  • Apply industry-standard security measures to protect your data.
  • Seek your explicit consent when necessary.
agreement.section5.title: 5. Privacy Protection
agreement.section6.content: We are not liable for any direct, indirect, incidental, special, or consequential damages arising from the use of the Service.
agreement.section6.highlight:
Important Notice: Because the Service is powered by AI, it has the following limitations:

  • Responses may contain inaccuracies or outdated information.
  • The Service does not replace professional advice in fields such as medicine, law, or finance.
  • Output may include bias or inappropriate content.
  • The Service may be temporarily unavailable due to technical reasons.
agreement.section6.title: 6. Disclaimer
agreement.section7.content:
We reserve the right to:

  • Modify or discontinue the Service at any time.
  • Update this Agreement.
  • Restrict or suspend accounts that violate the Agreement.

We will notify users in advance of major changes or termination and assist you in exporting relevant data.
agreement.section7.title: 7. Changes and Termination
agreement.section8.content: This Agreement is governed by the laws of the People‚Äôs Republic of China. Any disputes shall first be resolved through amicable consultation. If consultation fails, either party may bring the dispute before the competent court where BIC Intelligence is located.
agreement.section8.title: 8. Dispute Resolution
agreement.section9.content:
If you have questions or suggestions regarding this Agreement, please contact us:

  • Website: https://www.dbaiops.com/
  • Customer Support: 400 880 0486
  • Address: Suite 516, Tower E1, Yuanchengxin Building, 12 Yumin Road, Chaoyang District, Beijing
agreement.section9.title: 9. Contact Us

popup.meta.title: BIC-QA - BIC Intelligent Q&A Assistant
popup.policy.disclaimer.content:
Important Notice: Please read this disclaimer carefully before using the BIC-QA AWR analysis service.

  1. Service Nature

    The BIC-QA AWR analysis service is an AI-assisted tool. The analysis results are for reference only and do not constitute professional advice or guarantees of any kind.

  2. Data Usage

    Your uploaded AWR report is used solely for this analysis task. The system automatically deletes the report after completion. BIC will not retain any copies of the report nor use it for any purpose beyond this analysis.

  3. Analysis Results

    The analysis results are generated based on the uploaded AWR report and may contain inaccuracies or be incomplete. Users should apply professional judgment when using the results. BIC assumes no responsibility for the accuracy, completeness, or suitability of the analysis outcomes.

  4. Service Interruptions

    BIC reserves the right to suspend or interrupt the service for maintenance, upgrades, or other reasons and is not liable for any resulting losses.

  5. Limitation of Liability

    To the maximum extent permitted by law, BIC is not liable for any direct, indirect, incidental, or consequential damages resulting from the use of this service.

By using this service, you acknowledge that you have read, understood, and agreed to the above disclaimer.
popup.policy.disclaimer.title: Disclaimer
popup.policy.security.content:
Data Security Commitment: BIC places the highest priority on safeguarding user data security and privacy.

1. Data Privacy Protection

Your uploaded AWR report is used exclusively for this analysis task and is automatically deleted once the task is completed. BIC guarantees that it:

  • Does not retain any copies of the report;
  • Does not disclose, share, or sell user data to third parties;
  • Does not use the report for any purpose other than this analysis;
  • Strictly complies with applicable data protection laws and regulations.

2. Data Transmission Security

All data transmissions are encrypted to ensure security throughout the transfer process.

3. Sensitive Data Recommendations

Important: For AWR reports containing sensitive data, BIC strongly recommends that you:

  • Use the commercial edition instead of the public cloud version;
  • Mask or anonymize sensitive information before submission;
  • Upload only the data required for analysis and avoid excessive sensitive content.

4. Data Storage

The system automatically deletes uploaded AWR report files once the analysis is complete. Analysis results (excluding the original report) may be retained to improve services, but they will not contain any information that can identify individual users.

5. User Responsibility

Users must ensure that the uploaded AWR reports do not violate laws, regulations, or infringe upon the rights of others. Users bear full responsibility for the content they submit.

We are committed to safeguarding your data, but we encourage you to assess data sensitivity before use and select a more secure service option when necessary.
popup.policy.security.title: Security Statement

privacy.header.subtitle: BIC Intelligence Smart Q&A Assistant
privacy.header.title: BIC-QA Privacy Policy
privacy.meta.title: Privacy Policy - BIC-QA
privacy.section1.content:
BIC Intelligence ("we", "our") takes your privacy seriously. This Privacy Policy (the "Policy") explains how we collect, use, store, and protect your personal information.

Please read the Policy carefully. If you disagree with any part, you may choose not to use our services. Your continued use of the services constitutes your acceptance of this Policy.
privacy.section1.title: 1. Overview
privacy.section10.content:
If you have any questions, suggestions, or complaints regarding this Policy, please contact us:

  • Customer Support: 400 880 0486
  • Website: https://www.dbaiops.com/
  • Address: Suite 516, Tower E1, Yuanchengxin Building, 12 Yumin Road, Chaoyang District, Beijing

We will respond within 15 business days after receiving your request.
privacy.section10.title: 10. Contact Us
privacy.section11.content:
This Policy takes effect on the date of publication.

Last Updated: August 1, 2025
privacy.section11.title: 11. Effective Date
privacy.section2.content:
2.1 Information Provided by You

  • Registration data: username, company name, email address, etc.
  • Configuration data: API keys, provider settings, model parameters, etc.
  • Usage data: questions you submit, feedback you provide, etc.
  • Contact data: information shared via support channels.

2.2 Information Collected Automatically

  • Device details: device type, operating system, browser version, etc.
  • Usage logs: access time, frequency, feature preferences, etc.
  • Technical data: IP address, cookies, session identifiers, etc.
privacy.section2.title: 2. Information We Collect
privacy.section3.content:
We use the collected information for the following purposes:

  • Service delivery: provide intelligent Q&A, knowledge-base search, and related features.
  • Service improvement: analyze usage data to optimize functionality and experience.
  • Security: detect and prevent fraud, abuse, and security threats.
  • Customer support: respond to inquiries, complaints, and suggestions.
  • Legal compliance: fulfill obligations required by applicable laws and regulations.
privacy.section3.title: 3. How We Use Information
privacy.section4.content:
We may share information under the following circumstances:

  • With your explicit consent
  • Service partners: trusted vendors who help us operate the Service (e.g., cloud providers)
  • Legal requirements: when required by law, court order, or government request
  • Protection of rights: to safeguard the lawful rights, property, or safety of our users or the public
  • Business transfers: during mergers, acquisitions, or asset transfers
privacy.section4.highlight: Our Commitment: We will never sell, rent, or trade your personal information to third parties.
privacy.section4.title: 4. Information Sharing
privacy.section5.content:
5.1 Storage Location

Your personal information is primarily stored on servers located in China. For cross-border transfers, we will ensure compliance with applicable laws.

5.2 Security Measures

  • Encrypt data transmission and storage using industry-standard methods.
  • Implement strict access control and authentication.
  • Conduct regular security audits and vulnerability scans.
  • Provide privacy and security training to employees.
  • Maintain an incident response plan.

5.3 Data Retention

We retain personal information only for as long as necessary to fulfill the purposes described in this Policy, unless otherwise required by law or with your consent.
privacy.section5.title: 5. Data Storage and Security
privacy.section6.content:
You are entitled to the following rights under applicable laws:

  • Access: learn how we collect and use your information.
  • Rectification: request corrections to inaccurate information.
  • Erasure: request deletion of your personal information.
  • Withdrawal: withdraw consent you previously provided.
  • Portability: obtain a copy of your personal data.
  • Complaint: lodge a complaint with relevant regulators.

To exercise these rights, please contact us using the details provided in Section 10.
privacy.section6.title: 6. Your Rights
privacy.section7.content:
We use cookies and similar technologies to:

  • Remember your preferences.
  • Deliver personalized experiences.
  • Analyze service usage.
  • Ensure service security.

You can manage cookies via your browser settings, though some features may not function properly.
privacy.section7.title: 7. Cookies and Similar Technologies
privacy.section8.content:
Our services are intended for adults. If you are a minor, please use the Service under the guidance of a guardian.

If we discover that minor information has been collected, we will delete it promptly.
privacy.section8.title: 8. Protection of Minors
privacy.section9.content:
We may update this Policy from time to time. Updated versions will be posted within the Service, and significant changes will be communicated via email or other methods.

We encourage you to review the Policy regularly to understand how we protect your data.
privacy.section9.title: 9. Updates to this Policy

guide.meta.title: BIC-QA Quick Start Guide
guide.header.title: BIC-QA Quick Start Guide
guide.header.subtitle: Complete the setup in four steps and start asking questions with knowledge base search right away.
guide.step1.title: Configure Base Models (including local Ollama)
guide.step1.item1: Open the extension Settings page and switch to Models & Providers.
guide.step1.item2: Add providers (e.g., local, Suzhou) and fill in the corresponding API Endpoint and API Key when required.
guide.step1.item3: For local Ollama, set the API Endpoint to http://localhost:11434/v1 (or your Ollama address).
guide.step1.item4: Click Test; the system will discover deployed models. Select the ones you need and Bulk Manage to save.
guide.step1.item5: After saving, the home page dropdown lets you choose by Model Name (Provider) to avoid duplicate names.
guide.step1.hint:
Models with identical names are distinguished as ‚ÄúModel Name (Provider)‚Äù, e.g., deepseek-r1:8b (local) and deepseek-r1:8b (Suzhou).

For local deployments with limited GPUs, consider using QWEN3:8B.
guide.step2.title: Register to obtain keys and knowledge base URLs, then save them
guide.step2.item1: Register on the enterprise knowledge base service or contact an admin to obtain the API Key and Knowledge Service URL (usually like .../knowledge).
guide.step2.item2: On the extension Settings page, fill in the Default Service URL and API Key under Knowledge Service.
guide.step2.item3: Click Save. Once saved, the knowledge dropdown and streaming channel will use this service.
guide.step2.note: We recommend configuring a valid API Key and Default URL under Knowledge Service first; the system prefers that credential pair.
guide.step2.hint: Forgot the key? Registered users can contact the platform admin or retrieve it via the registered email and service URL.
guide.step3.title: Enable the knowledge base Q&A service
guide.step3.item1: Select a configured Model (Provider) on the home page.
guide.step3.item2: Choose the desired knowledge base from the Knowledge Base dropdown (or keep ‚ÄúNo Knowledge Base‚Äù).
guide.step3.item3: Enter your question and click Send (or press Enter). The system combines retrieval with the model to answer.
guide.step3.item4: Responses stream in real time; you can Stop anytime and copy or export the result.
guide.step3.hint: When knowledge bases are enabled, the latest configuration is loaded automatically, prioritizing the Knowledge Service URL and API Key.
guide.step4.title: Configure parameters (prompt / temperature / similarity / topN)
guide.step4.item1: Choose a Parameter Rule on the home page or Settings; three built-in templates are ready to use.
guide.step4.item2: Customize Prompt, Temperature, Similarity, topN, and more as needed.
guide.step4.item3: After saving, select the rule when asking questions to apply it.
guide.step4.note: Parameter rules directly affect recall and generation: higher temperature increases creativity; similarity/topN adjust retrieval scope and count.
guide.step5.title: Import and export configurations
guide.step5.item1: On the extension Settings page, click Import or Export.
guide.step5.item2: Choose a JSON file to import, or export to a JSON file.
guide.step5.item3: During import, configurations are merged and you‚Äôll be prompted before overwriting duplicates.
guide.step5.item4: Export generates a JSON file containing the current configuration.
guide.step5.hint: Export regularly to migrate settings across devices or environments.
guide.footer.note: Tip: If a request fails, confirm the model endpoint, knowledge base URL, and API key, and check network connectivity.

notice.warning.body: To deliver better stability and performance, we are updating our domain. Please update your configuration promptly.
